name: Tiger Evolution - Idle Wild Creature Clicker Games
name_original: Tiger Evolution - Idle Wild Creature Clicker Games
description:
Tiger is so little cute creature and the most gentle animal.
One day, some scientific experiments made those tigers start to mutate.
Would you like to know what mutations happening to them?
Combine tigers to evolve them and discover their most strange, fantastic and visionary forms!
You never seen so many mutations and crazy features in other games!


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
INSTRUCTION
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
• Put same type tigers together to mutate new creatures
• Tigers poop can become coins and your money incoming
• Use tigers coins to buy new animals and new tools update
• You can also tap the tigers to make more coins
• More features can let the mutations more fun


~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
FEATURES
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
• There are more than 30 tigers for you to discover
• This game is a similar game with alpaca evolution but more fun
• Different endings and possibility: find your own tiger world to be special one than others
• Poop, get coins…. repeat and you will love it.

~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~
This is a simulator tiger world, think you are one tiger or the god of tigers.

Disclaimer: Although this Game is free to play, some content can be purchased for real money in game. If you do not want to use these features, please turn off in-app purchases in your device's settings.
